metadata.title: CVE-2019-17344 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Xen through 4.11.x allowing x86 PV guest OSusers to cause a denial of service by leveraging a long-running operationthat exists to support restartability of PTE updates.

criterions.comment: xen: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
